Instruction: Heat the oven to 350 degrees Fahrenheit (175 degrees Celsius).
Combine vegetable oil, eggs, and sugar in a mixing bowl. Blend in flour, baking powder, baking soda, buttermilk, salt, and vanilla.
Drop teaspoonfuls of batter onto cookie sheets, ensuring enough space between each one as they will expand during baking.
Place in the oven and bake for 8 to 10 minutes.
